body: He got rejected in the end, the girl still likes the professor.
i want the english version of your masterpieces
Just Translate this shit already man.... i can even pay for it if possible...

for those of you who cannot read japanese:
its implied that the woman at the end is his soon to be wife, and he says he does not regret anything.
there was also talk about marriage tieing you down, which he disagrees to at end.
so its a good (realistic) ending, he went full retard blind love and learned from it
I may not read what was written, but I sort of understood the scenario.... damn, that's sad . . . though wonder who will end up filling up that other side of that form
